mention.text: the jesuit provincial spokesman for central america
la prensa grafica san salvador dear
a note denying inexact reports on the case of the murdered jesuit priests
the case of the murdered jesuit priests
the newspaper which you direct , on 21 december 1989 , published on pages 6 and 7 two articles on the six jesuit priests that were murdered on 16 november
two articles on the six jesuit priests that were murdered on 16 november
the six jesuit priests that were murdered on 16 november
these priests ' neomarxist-philosophical position which is contrary to christian doctrine
those who accuse the murdered priests of having neomarxist philosophical positions
those who believe in them deserve
